title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 15 Deputy General Manager Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the 15 vacancies for Deputy General Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the post-graduation can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date o...
